scripts.build:bash: tsup --config tsup.config.ts && mv BP/scripts/dist/index.js BP/scripts/dist/essentialslib.js && mv BP/scripts/dist/index.d.mts BP/scripts/dist/essentialslib.d.ts && mv BP/scripts/dist/index.js.map BP/scripts/dist/essentialslib.js.map
scripts.build:powershell: tsup --config tsup.config.ts && mv BP/scripts/dist/index.js BP/scripts/dist/essentialslib.js && mv BP/scripts/dist/index.d.mts BP/scripts/dist/essentialslib.d.ts && mv BP/scripts/dist/index.js.map BP/scripts/dist/essentialslib.js.map
scripts.build:cmd: tsup --config tsup.config.ts && ren BP\scripts\dist\index.js essentialslib.js && ren BP\scripts\dist\index.d.mts essentialslib.d.ts && ren BP\scripts\dist\index.js.map essentialslib.js.map
